scripts.build: node ./import-pages.js; node --max-old-space-size=4000 ./node_modules/polymer-cli/bin/polymer.js build; bash ./package-build.sh; cp googleec3dc865d320cf01.html build/es6-unbundled/; cp googleec3dc865d320cf01.html build/es6-unbundled/data/pages/;
scripts.images: rsync -avh --delete -e "ssh -i /home/teamcity/build-deploy-scripts/keys/bamboo_deploy -l bamboo" bamboo@drupal.lib.virginia.edu:/usr/share/drupal/sites/default/files/ files; node ./imagemin-files.js; rsync -avh files-ready/ files;
scripts.images-deploy: npm run deploy; rsync -avh -e 'ssh -i $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa' files/ www14.lib.virginia.edu:/wwwstatic/files; rsync -avh -e 'ssh -i $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa' files/ static01.lib.virginia.edu:/lib_content47/static/uvalibappfiles;
scripts.quick-page-asset-update: node ./import-pages.js; rsync -avh --delete -e "ssh -i /home/teamcity/build-deploy-scripts/keys/bamboo_deploy -l bamboo" data/pages/ bamboo@static01.lib.virginia.edu:/lib_content47/static/drupalPages; rsync -avh -e "ssh -i /home/teamcity/build-deploy-scripts/keys/bamboo_deploy -l bamboo" data/ bamboo@www14.lib.virginia.edu:/wwwstatic/data; rsync -avh -e "ssh -i /home/teamcity/build-deploy-scripts/keys/bamboo_deploy -l bamboo" data/ bamboo@www14.lib.virginia.edu:/wwwstatic/es5/data; npm run images-lite; rsync -avh files-ready/ files; rsync -avh -e "ssh -i /home/teamcity/build-deploy-scripts/keys/bamboo_deploy -l bamboo" files/ bamboo@www14.lib.virginia.edu:/wwwstatic/files; rsync -avh --delete -e "ssh -i /home/teamcity/build-deploy-scripts/keys/bamboo_deploy -l bamboo" files-comp/ bamboo@www14.lib.virginia.edu:/wwwstatic/files-comp; rsync -avh -e "ssh -i /home/teamcity/build-deploy-scripts/keys/bamboo_deploy -l bamboo" files/ bamboo@static01.lib.virginia.edu:/lib_content47/static/uvalibappfiles;
